home.description: The Advanced Encryption Standard is the most popular symmetric-key cipher. If you want to learn the basics, dig deep into the details, or experiment with AES: you're in the right place!

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.body: This is a developing project and we would love to get your feedback on the tool. There is a{googleFormLink}that you can fill out to give us some highly valuable information - your thoughts!
feedback.contact: Alternatively, the creators of AES Adventure are listed below, feel free to send us an email if you're having issues with the tool.
